definition: to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

sentences.english: Astronomers say the newly-found planet lies in the middle of what's referred to as the habitable or Goldilocks zone.
sentences.chinese: 天文學家說這顆新星處在稱爲可居住區的中間。

sentences.english: Living area of the fan is unfavorable open boiler decorate.
sentences.chinese: 居住區內鍋爐的風機不宜露天佈置。

sentences.english: His recent history included exposure to dead chickens in his neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 他的近期病史包括在居住區接觸死雞。

sentences.english: All habitations and desert spaces are indeed of my own creation, set forth.
sentences.chinese: 所有的居住區和沙漠的空間的確是我發明的規定。

sentences.english: Yuanyang, a Hani minority settlement with vast rice- terraces .
sentences.chinese: 元陽縣，哈尼族居住區，有大片稻穀梯田。

sentences.english: Settlements filled in on the Peninsula, West Newport, Balboa Island and Lido Isle.
sentences.chinese: 住區填補朝鮮半島，西新港，巴爾博亞島和麗都島。

sentences.english: Fenghuang is a habitat area of Chinese minorities, ethnic Miao and Tujia.
sentences.chinese: 鳳凰是土家族和苗族的居住區。

sentences.english: They had a two-room house in a township.
sentences.chinese: 在有色人種居住區有套二室的房子。

sentences.english: A double-height studio was located on the lower floor, adjacent to the main living area.
sentences.chinese: 一個通高的工作室位於較低的樓層，毗鄰主要居住區。

sentences.english: Steel mills blowing smoke over residential buildings in Benxi, China.
sentences.chinese: 中國本溪，鋼廠黑煙從居住區的上空飄過。

sentences.english: Regenerate for developing to bring new life and investment to nearby urban settlements.
sentences.chinese: 爲周邊城市住區帶來新的活力和投資再發展。

sentences.english: The surrounding context is low-density residential composed of single-family houses predominantly.
sentences.chinese: 周邊環境是佔多數的獨立別墅組成的低密度居住區。

sentences.english: The plant landscape of urban residential areas has a trend of eco-development.
sentences.chinese: 城市居住區植物景觀具有生態化發展的趨勢。

sentences.english: We lived on Dauphine Street in the French Quarter for the longest time.
sentences.chinese: 我們在法國人居住區內的多芬街住的時間最長。

sentences.english: The second part is about the characters of the traditional rural settlement system.
sentences.chinese: 第二章爲傳統鄉村住區系統的主要特徵分析。

sentences.english: In that the most densely-populated areas of the world will be filled with night lights.
sentences.chinese: 在這最密集的居住區的世界將是充滿了夜間照明。
